thread.title: BRIEF-Preferred Apartment Communities Announces Acquisition Of Two Grocery-Anchored Shopping Centers Through New Market Properties

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Preferred Apartment Communities Announces Acquisition Of Two Grocery-Anchored Shopping Centers Through New Market Properties
text:
April 30, 2018 / 11:10 AM / Updated 26 minutes ago BRIEF-Preferred Apartment Communities Announces Acquisition Of Two Grocery-Anchored Shopping Centers Through New Market Properties Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Preferred Apartment Communities Inc :
* PREFERRED APARTMENT COMMUNITIES, INC. ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF TWO GROCERY-ANCHORED SHOPPING CENTERS THROUGH ITS WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY, NEW MARKET PROPERTIES, LLC
* PREFERRED APARTMENT COMMUNITIES INC - ACQUIRED ASSETS THROUGH ITS WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY NEW MARKET PROPERTIES, LLC
* PREFERRED APARTMENT COMMUNITIES INC - ASSETS WERE PURCHASED ALL CASH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
